footer.tagline: Fastest-growing supermarket in Saudi Arabia & UAE

about.title: About
about.p1: THAHAMA:market is the fastest-growing supermarket chain in Saudi Arabia and the UAE, dedicated to providing the highest quality products and exceptional customer service.
about.p2: Our commitment to freshness, quality, and community has made us a trusted name across the region. From fresh produce to household essentials, we ensure every product meets our rigorous standards.
about.p3: With multiple branches strategically located throughout Jeddah and expanding to the UAE, we're bringing premium shopping experiences closer to you.

services.subtitle: Everything you need, all in one place. Experience convenience like never before.

testimonials.title: What Our
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust us for their daily needs

items.ahmed: Best supermarket in Jeddah! Fresh products, excellent service, and great prices. My family shops here every week.
items.fatima: The home delivery service is amazing! Always on time and products are always fresh. The rewards program is a bonus!
items.khalid: I love the bakery section! Fresh bread every morning and the staff is always helpful and friendly.
items.sara: Clean store, organized aisles, and quality products. Thahama Market has become our go-to grocery store.
items.mohammed: Excellent variety of products and competitive prices. The meat and seafood section is outstanding!

hours.q: What are your store opening hours?
hours.a: Most of our branches are open from 7:00 AM to 12:00 AM daily. However, hours may vary by location. Please check the specific branch details for exact timings.

delivery.a: Yes! We offer fast and reliable home delivery services. You can place orders through our website or by calling your nearest branch. Delivery is available within designated areas.

rewards.q: Is there a loyalty rewards program?
rewards.a: Absolutely! Our rewards program allows you to earn points with every purchase. Points can be redeemed for discounts and exclusive offers. Sign up at any of our branches or online.

freshness.q: How do you ensure product freshness?
freshness.a: We receive daily deliveries of fresh produce, meat, seafood, and bakery items. Our strict quality control measures ensure that only the freshest products reach our shelves.

payment.a: Yes, we accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, mobile payments, and cash on delivery for online orders.

returns.q: Can I return or exchange products?
returns.a: We have a customer-friendly return policy. If you're not satisfied with a product, you can return it within 48 hours with a valid receipt, subject to our terms and conditions.

contact.title: Get in
contact.subtitle: We're here to help and answer any question you might have. We look forward to hearing from you.
contact.addressLine1: King Abdulaziz Road, Al Hamra District
contact.ctaText: Find the nearest Thahama Market branch and experience the quality yourself. We are always around the corner.
